definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: couch, bed (place of reclining; [[מטותם]] Sir 48:6);—abs. [[מִטָּה]] Am 3:12 + 14 t.; cstr. [[מִטַּת]] 2Ki 4:21; sf. [[מִטָּתִי]] Ps 6:7, [[מִטָּתְֶָ]] Ex 7:28, [[מִטָּתוֹ]] 2Sa 4:7 + 6 t.; pl. [[מִטּוֹת]] abs. 2Ki 11:2, 2Ch 22:11, cstr. Am 6:4, Es 1:6; —couch, bed, common article of furniture 2Ki 4:10, cf. v:2Ki 4:21, v:2Ki 4:32, 1Ki 17:19, for repose, esp. at night, or in illness Ge 47:31 (J; ´[[ראׁשׁ הַמּ]]), cf. Ge 48:2 (J), Ge 49:33 (P), Ps 6:7, Pr 26:14, 2Ch 24:25 (prob.), and for sitting, or reclining by day 1Sa 28:23, 1Ki 21:4; ´[[פְּאַת מ]] Am 3:12; seat of King Solomon Ct So 3:7; in bed-chamber ([[חֲדַר מִשְׁכָּב]]) Ex 7:28 (J), 2Sa 4:7; sts. portable 1Sa 19:15 cf. v:1Sa 19:13, v:1Sa 19:16, hence = bier 2Sa 3:31; sts. high 2Ki 1:4, 2Ki 1:6, 2Ki 1:16 ([[עָלָה שָׁם]] opp. [[יׇרַד מִן]]); sts. costly, (with frames) of ivory Am 6:4; for reclining at feasts, made of gold and silver Es 1:6; cf. [[כְּבוּדָּה]] ´[[מ]] Ez Eze 23:41 glorious couch; [[חֲדַר]] [[הַמִּטּוֹת]] 2Ki 11:2 = 2Ch 22:11 (v. [[חֶדֶר]]).—Cf. also [[מִשְׁכָּב]] ([[שׁכב]]), [[עֶרֶשׂ]].
